citation_details.title: Memory reactivation during sleep does not act holistically on object memory
citation_details.author: EM Siefert, S Uppuluri, J Mu, MC Tandoc
citation_details.abstract: Memory reactivation during sleep is thought to facilitate memory consolidation. Most sleep  reactivation research has examined how reactivation of specific facts, objects, and
